p: Quaternary ammonium salts of rosin esters are yellow solids. They can be prepared from maleopimaryl chloride (described in Section 3.2.5) and N,N-diethylethanolamine with hexadecyl bromide, or epichlorohydrin with triethylamine, according to Scheme 30, and using such separation methods as vacuum distillation, filtration, washing, drying, extraction and recrystallization [ 104, 191].
